2015-08-19

Two of the best

Not sure why but tonight I just want to listen to these two songs over and over, two of the most beautiful songs...

Northern Sky - Nick Drake

Thirteen - Big Star

... and here's a cover each that are also beautiful

Northern Sky - Faith Over Reason

Thirteen - Kathryn Williams
